nodes.text: Zap'Ulga was a male Dug under Sebolto's employ and was also involved with pirate activity and Nexu poaching. He was wanted by Senator Ask Aak for connections to a series of raids on Republic freighters carrying relief supplies to Malastare.
The bounty, which was worth 4,000 credits alive and 2,000 credits dead was later claimed by the notorious bounty hunter Jango Fett during his attempt to get to Sebolto.
